ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound breakfast pork sausage, cooked, drained
1 (10 ounce) can RO*TEL Diced Tomatoes and Green Chilies, undrained

cookingTips: Brown sausage thoroughly and drain excess fat before adding to dip
Keep dip warm in a slow cooker on low setting for serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the quickest way to make a crowd-pleasing dip that combines three simple ingredients into something flavorful?
